[quote="jungly, post:1, topic:748"]

[/quote]

This is very cool, thank you for working on it!  I noticed on your personal website that you've also worked on using PLA+ to verify the completeness of Bitcoin contract protocols (hat tip to @dgpv who has also done [similar work](https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2020-May/017866.html)).
